message_1: A company wants to create a marketing campaign and needs to send a postcard to each of their 84 clients. However, they want to send different pictures on each postcard. How many different pictures do they need to prepare, assuming each client receives only one postcard?
message_2: The company needs to prepare 84 different pictures for the postcards, as each of the 84 clients will receive a unique picture on their postcard.
